name: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSTonChassis - Verify xname_off powers off a chassis that is powered on
fullName: api.2-disruptive.test_xname_off.tavern#capmcAPIxnameOffPOSTonChassis - Verify xname_off powers off a chassis that is powered on

steps.name: Stage 0: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSTonChassisTarget - Retrieve a chassis from HSM to be used in later stages
Stage 1: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSTonChassisPrep - Power the target chassis on to prepare it for the test case
Stage 2: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSTonChassisStatusCheck - Verify that the target chassis is powered on using get_xname_status
Stage 3: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSTonChassisActual - Power the target chassis off using xname_off
Stage 4: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSTonChassisStatusCheck - Verify that the target chassis is powered off using get_xname_status
